level.heading: TERMINATION OF REGISTRATION FOR DOMESTIC ENTITIES (ยง 17-723)

level.text: A domestic filing entity whose registration is terminated and seeks reinstatement in the District shall:

Comply with the same rules found in Chapter 1 (General Provisions) of the Act (D.C. Official Code ยง 29-101.01 et seq. (2011 Repl.)) governing a domestic filing entity that is dissolved administratively and seeking reinstatement;
File with the Superintendent all reports which would have been due to the
Superintendent while the entity was dissolved administratively; and
Pay all corporate filing fees which would have been due to the Superintendent while the entity was dissolved administratively.
